ChunkText: if you are in a position to use the cap gap, please contact isss so we can update your I-20 with the cap gap extension to your OPT dates. h-1b portability portability refers to the ability to move your h-1b status from one employer to another.
ContextBefore: if your work permission is ending soon, you need to communicate this deadline to your employer, so they can submit your h-1b petition as soon as possible to get the receipt back before your work permission expires.
ContextAfter: the new employer must complete an h-1b application for you, but this process is different than the original application and is not limited by the h-1b cap of 65,000, since you already have an h-1b. you should work closely with the new employer for details on this process.
